TiXmlFactory Class Reference

Advanced feature. More...

#include <tinyxml.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Advanced feature.

If you want to use your own subclasses of Element, Text, Comment, and Unknown, you need to override the methods of factory. The first method call made on TiXmlDocument should be SetFactory.
